# Ideas

- Two products (ppv0 and ppv1)

- Map with colored region 45N +

- Verticallity (Ardyna paper)

- Show vertical profiles of Chla (from ppv1, find one on the NAS)

- Validation of the algorithm (round-robin paper)

- Work in progress (show some early results)
    - Show a figure with decreasing SIC and that will likely result in increasing PP for some region.
    - Show the WWF regions (allow to do regional budget)
    - Talk about CCI/GC (which one we used)

- Make the data available as soon as possible

```{r, fig.height=3, dev.args=list(bg="transparent")}
wm <- rnaturalearth::ne_countries(returnclass = "sf", scale = "medium") %>%
  st_crop(
    xmin = -180,
    xmax = 180,
    ymin = 45,
    ymax = 90
  )

wm %>%
  ggplot() +
  geom_sf(size = 0.25) +
  coord_sf(crs = 3411) +
  theme(
    panel.background = element_rect(fill = "white", colour = NA),
    plot.background = element_rect(fill = "transparent", colour = NA),
    panel.grid = element_blank(),
    panel.border = element_blank(),
    axis.text = element_blank(),
    axis.ticks = element_blank()
  )
```
